oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Recovering from mistakes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stup, Richard E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mistakes
errors
early-career veterinarians
coaching
mentoring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We all make mistakes. The key is to learn from them and use the experience to make a better plan for future action. This presentation is about managing oneself through making a sig­nificant mistake to recovering one’s self-confidence and the confidence of others. Participants will gain insights into men­tal processes that affect behavior and specific action steps that help to get back on track.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2023 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 87-89
